input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: InfobloxNIOS.

Find Network(s) in Infoblox Grid Manager.
Sample items Xml:
<items> <item> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> </target> <parameters> <network>10.0.0.0</network> <mask>24</mask> <comment>user comment</comment> <network-container>10.0.0.0/24</network-container> <network-view>default</network-view> <contains-address>10.0.0.0</contains-address> <extensible-attributes> <attribute> <key>Building</key> <value>sample</value> </attribute> </extensible-attributes> <network-type>ipv6</network-type> </parameters> </item> </items>
Elements' Description:
target[Conditional]: host[Conditional]: Host name or IP address of Infoblox Grid Manager. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets.
user-name[Conditional]: Username required to connect Infoblox Grid Manager. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets.
password[Conditional]: The password associated with the <user-name> provided. Encrypted password can be provided by providing an "encryption-type" attribute. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets. Valid values for encryption-type are: Plain, Base64 Default value: Plain
timeout-secs[Optional] Specifies the time, in seconds, after which the attempt to connect to the Infoblox Grid Manager fails. Default value in seconds: 60
Note: If no adapter configurations are specified while configuring the adapter dynamic target need to be defined under "target" tag.
Note: Multiple parameters should not combined to define the search criteria, except for network and mask, contains-address and network-view.
Note : Search by Network-type=ipv6 only support search by network, comment, extensible-attributes and network-view, only network and network-view can be used together to define the search criteria.
network[Optional] Specify the network or subnetwork.
mask[Optional] Specify the mask for the network. Must be used with network parameter.
comment[Optional] Specify the user comment for the network. Note : It will search all the networks for which comment contains any of the matching string.
network-container[Optional] Specify the network container, in CIDR format, to which this network belongs. e.g. CIDR Format : 10.0.0.0/24
network-view[Optional] Specify the network view in which the network is located. By default, all network views are searched (except when contain_address is specified -- see below).
contains-address[Optional] Specify an IPv4 address in string format. If specified, all other search attributes are ignored, except for network_view. When a value for this attribute is provided, network_view defaults to the system-defined default network view, unless specified. The returned network is the smallest network enclosing this IPv4 address.
extensible-attributes[Optional] Specify the extensible attributes for the network. E.g. Building, site etc.
network-type[Optional] Specify the type of network for search. Valid values ipv6, ipv4 [default]

documentation.description: Finds Network(s) in InfoBlog Grid Manager.
